text: Eric Nelson may refer to: * Eric Nelson (musician), American choral conductor, clinician, and composer * Eric George Nelson, American diplomat, Ambassador of the United States to Bosnia and Herzegovina * Eric M. Nelson, American historian and professor of government at Harvard University * Eric Nelson (West Virginia politician) (born 1960), American state legislator in West Virginia * Eric Nelson (Pennsylvania politician), member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives * Ricky Nelson (Eric Hilliard Nelson, 1940–1985), American actor, musician and singer-songwriter ==See also== * Eric Nelsen (born 1991), American actor
title: Eric Nelson
